description.value: As an action, you can spend 2 @Compendium[undertaking-homebrew.abilities.ZVH8L715PTWTQLSE]{✨ Flair} points to conjure a 15ft radius, 60ft tall cylinder of bright light centered on a point you can see that lasts for 1 minute. While a creature is inside the light, it is @Compendium[undertaking-homebrew.conditions.ZOBZ8V2YME5YOYZR]{🦁 Lionized} if it is an ally to you or @Compendium[undertaking-homebrew.conditions.WHN3T2G6R8HUKOQX]{🧿 Villainized} if it is hostile to you. Until the ability ends, you can use either your action or 1 @Compendium[undertaking-homebrew.abilities.ZVH8L715PTWTQLSE]{✨ Flair} point and a minor action to move the cylinder of light to another point you can see within 60 ft of you.
